name: browserwing
description: BrowserWing turns your browser actions into MCP commands Or Claude Skill, allowing AI agents to control browsers efficiently and reliably. Say goodbye to slow, token-heavy LLM interactions â€” let agents call commands directly for faster automation. Perfect for AI-driven tasks, browser automation, and boosting productivity.
readme_summary: BrowserWing is a platform for native browser automation with AI integration. It allows AI agents to control browsers by converting browser actions into commands or Claude Skills, enabling faster and more reliable automation compared to traditional LLM interactions.
key_features: Complete Browser Control via 26+ HTTP API endpoints
Built-in AI Agent with direct conversational interface
Universal AI Tool Integration with MCP & Skills protocol support
Flexible Export to MCP commands or Skills files
Intelligent Data Extraction powered by LLMs (OpenAI, Claude, DeepSeek)
Robust Session Management for cookies and storage
primary_use_case: Enabling AI agents to directly control web browsers for efficient and reliable automation tasks.
cover_image_prompt: A skilled artisan, representing BrowserWing, is meticulously crafting intricate clockwork mechanisms that are actually browser windows. Gears and cogs are replaced by UI elements like buttons and input fields. One window shows a user recording actions, which are then translated into glowing, flowing streams of data (MCP commands/Skills) feeding into a stylized AI brain icon. Another window displays extracted data neatly organized. The overall scene is a clean, modern workshop with subtle digital particle effects and the BrowserWing logo subtly etched on a workbench. Style: 3D isometric illustration with a bright, clean color palette.

name: CUT3R
description: Official implementation of Continuous 3D Perception Model with Persistent State
readme_summary: CUT3R is the official implementation of a Continuous 3D Perception Model with Persistent State. It enables the model to understand and reconstruct 3D environments over time, maintaining a consistent representation of the scene.
primary_use_case: Enabling continuous and persistent 3D scene understanding and reconstruction from sequential data.
cover_image_prompt: A digital sculptor meticulously chiseling away at a block of raw data, revealing a detailed, evolving 3D cityscape within. The sculptor's tools emit streams of light that continuously update the city's persistent state, showing changes over time like new buildings appearing or roads being built. Small holographic screens around the scene display real-time 3D reconstructions and data flow. The overall mood is one of creation and continuous development, with a clean, futuristic aesthetic. The image should be a 3D isometric illustration with vibrant, glowing elements and subtle code snippets integrated into the environment, emphasizing the CUT3R repository's function.

name: sqlit
description: A user friendly TUI for SQL databases. Written in python. Supports SQL server, Mysql, PostreSQL, SQLite, Turso and more.
readme_summary: sqlit is a user-friendly Terminal User Interface (TUI) application written in Python for interacting with various SQL databases directly from your command line. It aims to provide a fast, intuitive, and efficient way to connect, query, and inspect database data without the need for heavy graphical applications.
key_features: Connection manager for saving and switching between multiple database connections.
Support for a wide range of databases including SQL Server, PostgreSQL, MySQL, SQLite, and cloud-specific databases.
Docker integration for automatic discovery of running database containers.
SSH tunnel support for secure connections to remote databases.
Vim-style keybindings and modal editing for efficient terminal use.
Data inspection with filtering and fuzzy search capabilities for large result sets.
Autocomplete for SQL keywords, tables, and columns.
Secure credential storage using the OS keyring.
Context-aware help and themes for a customizable user experience.
primary_use_case: To provide a fast, efficient, and user-friendly terminal-based interface for developers to connect to, query, and manage data across a wide variety of SQL databases without leaving their command line environment.
cover_image_prompt: A skilled artisan, holding a sleek, glowing terminal interface like a magic wand, is effortlessly sculpting intricate data structures from raw, unrefined digital clay. The artisan is surrounded by various stylized database icons (PostgreSQL, MySQL, SQLite, etc.) that are feeding streams of data into the terminal. The output is a beautifully organized, crystalline data sculpture emerging from the terminal's screen. Subtle lines of code and glowing data particles float around the scene, hinting at the underlying technology. The overall mood is one of focused creation and elegant simplicity, rendered in a clean, 3D isometric illustration style with a vibrant, tech-inspired color palette.

name: video2x
description: A machine learning-based video super resolution and frame interpolation framework. Est. Hack the Valley II, 2018.
readme_summary: Video2X is a C++ framework for enhancing video quality through machine learning. It offers super-resolution to upscale video clarity and frame interpolation to smooth motion, supporting various AI models and GPU acceleration via Vulkan.
key_features: Rewrite in C/C++ for speed and efficiency
Support for Anime4K v4, Real-ESRGAN, Real-CUGAN, RIFE
GPU acceleration via ncnn and Vulkan
New GUI and installer for Windows
primary_use_case: Upscaling low-resolution videos and increasing frame rates using AI for improved visual quality.
cover_image_prompt: A digital artist meticulously restoring an old, pixelated film reel. The artist uses a glowing, futuristic brush that, as it touches the film, transforms the blurry, low-resolution frames into sharp, high-definition scenes. On one side, stacks of old, faded film reels represent the input, while on the other, a pristine, vibrant digital display showcases the enhanced output. Subtle UI elements and data streams flow around the artist, indicating the AI processing. The scene is set in a clean, modern studio with a focus on the transformation process. The overall style is a 3D isometric illustration with a vibrant color palette, emphasizing clarity and detail.

name: SmartImage
description: Reverse image search tool (SauceNao, IQDB, Ascii2D, trace.moe, and more)
readme_summary: SmartImage is a C# application that provides a powerful reverse image search functionality. It allows users to find the source of an image by querying multiple popular search engines simultaneously and presenting the best match directly in the browser. It offers both a Windows GUI and a cross-platform command-line interface.
key_features: Reverse image search across multiple engines (SauceNao, IQDB, Ascii2D, trace.moe, Google, TinEye, Yandex, Bing, etc.)
primary_use_case: Finding the original source or similar instances of an image online.
cover_image_prompt: A magnifying glass hovering over a digital collage of various images (anime art, photographs, logos). As the magnifying glass focuses on one image, a clear, glowing line extends from it, connecting to a stylized representation of the internet or a database. Surrounding this central element are small, subtle icons representing different search engines (like Google's 'G', TinEye's bird, SauceNao's logo). The overall mood is one of discovery and clarity, with a clean, modern aesthetic. The repository name 'SmartImage' is subtly integrated into the background or a small UI element. Style: 3D isometric illustration with a vibrant but focused color palette.

name: WebDeck
readme_summary: WebDeck is a free, open-source alternative to Elgato's StreamDeck. It's a Flask web application that allows users to control their computer remotely from any browser-enabled device with a touchscreen, acting as a customizable interface for various actions.
primary_use_case: To provide a software-based, accessible, and free alternative to physical StreamDeck devices for controlling computer functions remotely via a web browser on a touchscreen device.
cover_image_prompt: A digital illustration depicting a hand holding a tablet, with its screen displaying a grid of customizable buttons. Each button on the tablet screen is visually linked by glowing lines to a different icon on a computer desktop in the background, such as a play button for media, a brush for creative software, and a terminal icon for command execution. The scene should convey seamless remote control and customization, with subtle 'WebDeck' branding integrated into the tablet's interface. The overall mood should be modern and efficient, using a clean, bright color palette and a 3D isometric art style.
